subject: email error for OrdersOrder #SSN5385
description_text: salve ho commesso un errore nel inserire la email per l'ordine Orders Order #SSN5385 vi chiedo di aggiornarla con questa e non con fabiouniuque@icloud.com che ho fornito in fase d'ordine . ordine intestato a Fabiodomenico romano

conversations.body_text: Hi Fabio domenico Romano,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510431582021/trackdetails

Absolutely everything is fine the package has arrived and I made the change of the email, creating an e-mail with the wrong email that I had marked on your site and then in turn making a variation on the correct email. I wanted to inform you if you like that I am a new Italian SIM racer I was in the world of SIM until three years ago and this year I am starting again and I decided to lean on your pedals for the quality price ratio, if it would be nice to collaborate I am now creating the entire part of the social media that will take care of disseminating and spreading races reviews workstations creations for SIM racing and everything that revolves around this world if you please, support me maybe we can find a way to collaborate. Saluti Romano Fabio Domenico Sent from iPhone Il giorno 15 gen 2026, alle ore 11:04, service@simsonn.com ha scritto: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Fabio domenico Romano, I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it? 
 
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510431582021/trackdetails 
 
 
 
 
 Il
 Sab, 27 Dic, 2025 alle 10:21 PM
 , Fabio domenico Romano <fabiounique@icloud.com> ha scritto:
 salve ho commesso un errore nel inserire la email per l'ordine Orders

Hi Fabio domenico Romano,     Thank you for your purchase. If you could spread the word about us, we might be able to explore a partnership. What are your requirements for collaboration?

Siamo due simracer italiani corriamo dal 2020 , ora stiamo creando un canale dove vogliamo creare contenuti di coppia , vogliamo implementare sfide e comparative dove ogni uno di noi da dei voti .Non abbiamo pretese economiche in quanto anche noi dobbiamo far crescere ora il canale , visto che in italia vedo che manca qualcuno che testano i vostri prodotti ci piacerebbe iniziare questa esperienza con voi , in quanto propio l’assenza dei vostri prodotti recensiti in italiano , questo può spingere bene entrambi, avendo già la vostra pedaliera , potremmo testare i vostri sensori aptici e le varie periferiche che proponete. Rimango in attesa di un vostro responso cordiali saluti Romano Fabio Domenico Inviato da iPhone Il giorno 17 gen 2026, alle ore 04:37, service@simsonn.com ha scritto: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Fabio domenico Romano, 
 
 Thank you for your purchase. If you could spread the word about us, we might be able to explore a partnership. What are your requirements for collaboration? 
 
 
 
 Il
 Gio, 15 Gen alle 10:53 PM
 , Fabio domenico Romano <fabiounique@icloud.com> ha scritto:
 Absolutely everything is fine the package has arrived and I made the change of the email, creating an e-mail with the wrong email that I had marked on your site and then in turn making a variation on the correct email. I wanted to inform you if you like that I am a new Italian SIM racer I was in the world of SIM until three years ago and this year I am starting again and I decided to lean on your pedals for the quality price ratio, if it would be nice to collaborate I am now creating the entire part of the social media that will take care of disseminating and spreading races reviews workstations creations for SIM racing and everything that revolves around this world if you please, support me maybe we can find a way to collaborate. 
 
 Saluti 
 Romano Fabio Domenico
